html: 4 key takeaways from @TheIFS pre-Budget briefing for MPs: 1. Public finances in OK shape thanks to difficult decisions taken since 2010 2. Taxation at highest since 1981 (as % of GDP). 3. text:
4 key takeaways from @TheIFS pre-Budget briefing for MPs:
1. Public finances in OK shape thanks to difficult decisions taken since 2010
2. Taxation at highest since 1981 (as % of GDP).
3. Capital spending rising strongly. Good for long term.
4. Debt still high and needs to fall.pic.twitter.com/Z7Pqcuei9t
